website_summaries.verdict: A luxurious serum that works to decrease the look of fine lines and improve your skin's overall health.
pros: Infused with a antioxidant-packed iris extract
Helps hydrate skin and diminish the appearance of fine line and wrinkles
Customers notice an immediate increase in suppleness and plumpness
cons: Definitely a splurge compared to other similar products on the market

customer_reviews.title: NOT THE PRODUCT ADVERTISED
customer_reviews.text: This is not the product advertised. I know this because I have been using to legitimate professional quality image original hyarulonic acid for a few years now. In the image, the product on the left is the professional grade acid, on the right is what I can only guess to be the OTC version that would retail in skin care spas. I’m pretty angry. It is not even close to the quality of the actual product and it was not cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Alexis

customer_reviews.title: SLIGHT plumping effect.  Feels like silk.
customer_reviews.text: This is one skin product I'll buy again & again. It's relatively environmentally clean, with no dangerous acrylates. I'm allergic to many products, but not this one. It feels like silk on my face. The dropper is handy for not spilling out too much product. CAUTION:. Use a slight amount, or your moisturizer and makeup won't go on smoothly afterwards. This product is relatively thick. I noticed a SLIGHT plumping effect...which subtly softens my lines. Considering the crazy prices of some skin products, this price seems very fair.
customer_reviews.author: Angela G.

customer_reviews.title: Works well on upper lip wrinkles.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for 2 weeks. Noticeable difference with upper lip (smokers) wrinkles!! Dropper is less desirable, does not always get product in tube when squeezed. Have to sometimes squeeze 2-3 times.
customer_reviews.author: LMW

customer_reviews.title: This product was not as described
customer_reviews.text: I bought this serum many times from the local beauty store. Unfortunately, the product I bought from here was extremely liquid, different smell and it did not absorb as the previous ones I bought from the store. I honestly suspect that this item was NOT authentic.
customer_reviews.author: Giulietta

customer_reviews.title: Different packaging and look
customer_reviews.text: This is not the same bottle and formula as pictured. Image must have updated this product and now comes in a larger bottle with white and silver wrapping. The ingredients appear to be the same but difference in smell of the product and consistency. Should update the picture to reflect the most current product if it is in fact the same product. I don’t feel it works as well as the older one that is pictured in the image for this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this serum
customer_reviews.text: I love this serum. Been using it for a few months now along with vitamin c serum. I started when I noticed my laugh lines and forehead wrinkles starting to look more pronounced. After regular usage I noticed they no longer are as pronounced. My skin looks and feels more radiant without makeup. I must also add I have been using the vitamin c serum for over a year.
customer_reviews.author: Esther E Sarabia

customer_reviews.title: Image skincare's entire line is amazing! Not sure it makes me look better or ...
customer_reviews.text: Image skincare's entire line is amazing! Not sure it makes me look better or younger but my skin feels amazing! I have tried to use other skincare anti aging brands but alway regret doing so and feel like I wasted money trying to save a few pennies! The line is expensive but I absolutely love how my skin feels and so it is worth it to me!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for a week now. Seems to be helping diminish lines on my forehead.

customer_reviews.title: Not buying again
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t see a mayor changed, way too expensive for not get any results
customer_reviews.author: Gisella Tamariz

customer_reviews.title: Anti wrinkle
customer_reviews.text: Love this product!! A little goes a long way and the results are fantastic!!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product. However, it is very costly and I probably will not reorder.

customer_reviews.title: broken seal on product when received.
customer_reviews.text: This product not completely full when I received it, since the seal was broken and it had leaked out. The bottle was a mess with residue from the product down the side of the bottle. I have other Image products that I have liked, but this was a disappointment. I haven't wanted to use it since I was afraid the product might be compromised.
customer_reviews.author: KD Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Did the formula change with the labeling?
customer_reviews.text: It seems like the packaging / label has changed and with that the formula. This product never had a citrus scent to it. I have used this product around my eyes for years . Seems like something has changed with it.
customer_reviews.author: Denise B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very lightweight and makes your skin so smooth as soon as you apply.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product. Fills in lines and wrinkles and pumps ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Fills in lines and wrinkles and pumps skin. I am 49 years of age and I've lost some volume underneath my eyes and this really helps.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Weber

customer_reviews.title: The Complements are great!
customer_reviews.text: I have had complements on my skin since using this product. I also use other Image products, so I'm sure the complements come by using the products together. This goes on nicely.

customer_reviews.title: Is this the exact same item I would purchase in the Dermotologist office? Or is it a fraud

customer_reviews.title: Great product

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing! My skin feels incredible after I use this. I will definetly be repurchasing!

customer_reviews.title: Love it & it has not made my face brake ...
customer_reviews.text: This works really well for dry, peeling skin! Love it & it has not made my face brake out.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My most favorite skincare product. My oily skin has aged into combination skin. This is perfect for me!!!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Smoother and firmer looking skin at 65 years is awesome!!!

customer_reviews.title: Really works!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for 6 months and it has made a noticeable difference in the lines at the corner of my eyes and crow's feet. It has also improved my under eye darkness. I use a small amount (my first bottle lasted almost the entire 6 months) under each eye every evening and couldn't be more satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Soixante97

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this product . I am just starting to switch to the Image line of facial products. So far I am enjoying all of them and a nice price point .

customer_reviews.title: Great serum
customer_reviews.text: Excellent serum combined with a variety of other Image One skin care products. Expensive but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Hyaluronic Acid is awesome. Plain and simple.
customer_reviews.text: "What are you using on your skin?" I get this question a lot. I've been using Image Skin Care's hyaluronic acid for about a year now and I get a ton of compliments on my skin. I like this product because I put it on my face after I get out of the shower every morning and it gets absorbed immediately. Unlike other products (creams, lotions, etc) this does not run down my face if I start to sweat. Even the 30 year-old girls in my office have pointed out that I have no worry-lines "at my age" (I'm 42). I think this stuff is the cat's meow.
customer_reviews.author: K10ma

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product makes ones skin feel like velvet and it is moisturizing . This is a recent find for me .
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Ann

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product, my husband found it in my cabinet and started using it. Within 1 week of daily use, I asked if he had gotten fillers because his eyes looked so good. Works great on wrinkles.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is great but the price tripled so I will not buy again

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: It works great.
customer_reviews.text: I have used this for a while. It works great.

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Why is this product is called filler? Good for oily skin. Dry skin may need more moisturizer. Can mix with Ormedic.

customer_reviews.title: Great product for skincare!
customer_reviews.text: My esthetician recommended this and I mix it with my moisturizer daily. Love it!

customer_reviews.title: Update.....awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: I wrote a review previously about developing a rash from this product...it turned out to be caused by something else but simply coincided with first usage of this. So, now I know and am continuing to use this serum, I like it a lot. Makes my skin feel great and that's asking a lot for my awful complexion. So, this is now a 5-star in my opinion 😊
customer_reviews.author: Kquinn

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this serum
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this serum. I know skin care, and this is a product to have. I understand there is a concern that sometimes these are not always the actual name brand. I used this product enough buying direct from salons that as far as I can tell I believe it to be authentic. I would definitely state otherwise if I believed it was a knock off. Recommend this highly.

customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this stuff. I live in the desert where there is almost no humidity and this actually gives my skin a glow. The results are immediate. I will definitely buy again!

customer_reviews.text: I have use fillers for years. This type is so smooth, it doesn't react with your make up, or face lotions. You can feel the reaction right away. The price is excellent. It doesn't make your skin sensitive

customer_reviews.text: My skin feels and looks smoother. Jar seems to be running out quickly; maybe I'm using too much. Other than that, I really like it.

customer_reviews.title: This is the best Hyaluronic I have ever used and makes my skin ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the best Hyaluronic I have ever used and makes my skin look amazing. I would highly recommend any one, men and women to try this product.

customer_reviews.title: Love it! I have tried many skincare lines
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I have tried many skincare lines. Image is by far the best on the market

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It tightens the skin right away. I use it under makeup.

customer_reviews.title: Good EWG rating! Excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: I am trying to rid my house of the top ten toxic chemicals. This rated well (low on the harmful scale). Vital C has some terrible chemicals in some products. I have been using the line for years and loved it. I am done with their products with phosphate, PEG, EDTA. I am so glad I can keep using this product.
customer_reviews.author: Janine

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product about a month or so, and only after using BOTH morning and night I feel my skin has gotten better.. I have acne prone/ moderate acne skin and scarring.. and this has left my face feeling moisturizer without being oily. The only downfall is the price which is why I'm giving 4 out of 5 stars.. all image products are pretty pricey so no surprise there, but If you use twice a day then you're going to run out of the bottle pretty quickly.. once I'm out I will try something less expensive. But if the price doesn't bother you then I recommend!
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I use this product every morning, before make up, and at night. It has helped exfoliate my skin and plump up my skin. Feels wonderful and silky going on.

customer_reviews.title: This is one of my staples in my skincare routine ...
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my staples in my skincare routine. I absolutely cannot imagine not using it daily as I can really tell when I stop using it. Your skin just really responds well, and it helps prevent wrinkling and aging of the skin through supporting the structure of the skin cells and the connective elements of the skin.

customer_reviews.title: Bad bottles, and shipping

I physically was only able to use the product 3 times. where my other bottle lasted 3 months due to the malfunction of the bottle and cap only 3 times. will never buy from them again.

customer_reviews.title: Not the same as spa bought product

customer_reviews.title: Not happy

customer_reviews.title: The product, although it had a seal, the ...
customer_reviews.text: The product , although it had a seal, the bottle was not full.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria

customer_reviews.title: Goodbye fine lines and wrinkles!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this product! I've been using this product for 8 months now, little to no wrinkles on my forehead and around my eyes (I'm 44 and have always lived at the beach and been exposed to sun). I've always worn sunscreen however the sun takes its toll on your face and this fantastic product from Image has smoothed the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. Wonderful product!
customer_reviews.author: Micah Finnila

customer_reviews.title: Better hydration
customer_reviews.text: Makes my face look and fell more hydrated. Being not so young anymore, this is important to me. My medspa owner recommended this product and I'm so glad she did. I've used many moisturizers over the years but hyaluronic acid in combination with my moisturizer is the best. HA is a humectant, attracts water and helps prevent moisture from escaping from your skin. I will always use it.
customer_reviews.author: Anita

customer_reviews.title: Old Product!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for several years and have only purchased it from a salon. I decided to but thru Amazon because of the reduced price! Well, you get what you pay for - this product was not like I had purchased in local salons. It was thick and gooey almost like glue which is an indication that the product was old and out dated. I cannot find a date on the item but it was not the same.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Boozer

customer_reviews.title: amazing results
customer_reviews.text: I love this serum. Every time I put it on my face feels so hydrate almost like a magic potion. I have been complemented on how young I look. I am 33 and complimented that I look 24. On of the few things that will stay in my minimalist make up and night routine. Very decent priced can't complain about that either.
customer_reviews.author: Jo-anne K.

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Image skin care for about a year now and I am very happy that I switched. This Hyaluronic Filler is great to put on after you have cleaned your face. Sometimes I don't put it on when I'm in a hurry and I'm always upset when I don't take the time to put it on because my skin just doesn't feel the same without it. I have purchased this product several times.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Love, Love - my skin has never looked better ...
customer_reviews.text: Love, Love - my skin has never looked better and been more hydrated. I've used this product for at least a year and I am finally to a point where my skin doesn't feel tight after washing my face. And people comment all the time on how glowing my skin is. I only use this product line - Love it!
customer_reviews.author: MWBrigRanMom

customer_reviews.title: Great product line.
customer_reviews.text: This helps give me a nice glow. It works well under makeup, and doesn't leave a greasy finish. My skin looks smooth. I use it around my eye area, too and it helps soften fine lines and plump up my skin. I've been using Image products for 10 years now, and I love all of them I've tried.
customer_reviews.author: C00kie

customer_reviews.title: As good as all of the other Image products I use
customer_reviews.text: I do not know if there are long term effects of using this product, but I love it. It temporarily makes my skin look and feel great. I have been using it daily for about a week now. I will definitely buy another bottle when I run out.
customer_reviews.author: S105

customer_reviews.title: Use it religiously...
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I've used 5 bottles so far. I feel like it helps preventing my acne. I don't have acnes anymore after using this along with Neutrogena Rapid Clear Acne Defense Face Lotion. I use this day and night religiously and I feel nervous when I start running out of it. It has helped my skin to be more hydrated and calm. I will continue to purchase.

customer_reviews.title: Wish I knew about H/A years ago!
customer_reviews.text: A thirst-quenching drink for my face! Never go a day without it!

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I use this every day and it makes my skin feel really wonderful. I would recommend it to anyone who wants nice skin.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I think this is really making a difference! Lines above my lips were getting really deep and now they are maybe 75% less after just a few weeks. I use this in the morning with my Olay CC cream and at night with my Image Vitamin C cream. It goes on very nicely and absorbs quickly and I have not notice any order or fragrance - and I am sensitive to perfume. I'll be using this forever so definitely will buy and again and recommend it.

customer_reviews.text: Great hydration and smells great. Image line is one of the best lines and I work in dermatology so I have seen everything

customer_reviews.title: I like it..
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product daily for several years. It feels silky and goes on very smooth. It does absorb easily and dries fast. I don't use it by itself as I add a moisturizer over top of it. You do not need to use a lot as it glides easily over your face and I also use it on my throat. Would definitely recommend to try. I have used several of the Image beauty care products and have been pleased with them all...so far!

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I use Image Skin Care products for many years. Love it!

product_meta.title: Image Skincare Ageless Total Pure Hyaluronic Filler, 1 oz
product_meta.description:
This topical filler's high concentration of hyaluronic acid rapidly plumps skin and smoothest the appearance of fine lines. Hyaluronic acid is known for its ability to bind up to 1,000 times its weight in water, which enhances elasticity and delivers a dewy glow. Vitamin E is a superior, bioavailable antioxidant that helps to protect against trans epidermal water loss. Delivers a noticeable boost of hydration to dry, dehydrated or irritated skin. Prevents the evaporation of moisture from the skin

BRAND STORY
IMAGE Skincare is a clean and professional line backed by clinical results. Created by an esthetician, formulated by Dr. Marc Ronert, a plastic surgeon, and represented by a network of 20,000 skincare professionals.
